content: Often shipped without Carriage return line feed after scan enabled. To enable this setting user has to print out the page from the link below and scan the configuration barcode.
Known fault where scanner will restart regularly when scanning making a 3-tone ascending bleep. Requires a new scanner from Oxhoo
To request a swap out, you will need the PED serial number, which can be found on the back of the PED. format is e.g.  s/n: 123456789

You can setup templates in a few different ways depending how the printer is connected.  If its using the serial port, the template needs to be constructed with code and styling.  If its a USB connection, you can use the GUI template builder.
